directions.step:
preheat oven to 400 degrees, wash and dry tatoes,. Cut the potatoe (but only 3/4 through) into 4 slices. Slice onion into 1/4 inch slices then in half, put onion inside potatoe slices. Rub potatoe with butter and wrap in tin foil cook for one hour
Posted to Bakery-Shoppe Digest V1 #214 by "Pollywog" <hlewis@cci-29palms.com> on Sep 2, 1997
